description: Upgrade the roofing insulation; new single ply membrane roof covering to flat roof areas; raising of internal facing parapet brick walls; new Heritage style rooflights and lanterns to replace existing; repairs to masonry, timber windows, metal windows, brickwork steam clean to non-camouflaged areas; renewal of sash cords; windows to be upgraded with secondary sealed window unit, secondary glazing installed; rainwater goods to be retained and refurbished & installation of wire bird protection system.
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

<p>All new works, and works of making good to the retained fabric, whether internal or external, shall be finished to match the original work with regard to the methods used and to material, dimensions, composition, form, colour, finish and profile, and in the case of brickwork, facebond and pointing.</p><p>REASON: In accordance with Section 17 (1) (b) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and to ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p>Before work begins, proposals for the method and extent of repointing shall be approved in writing with the Local Planning Authority and be carried out accordingly.&nbsp; The required detail shall include 1 metre square sample panels showing the proposed joints, mortar mix, profile and finish.&nbsp; No other repointing of brickwork is authorised by this consent without prior approval of the details.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</p>

<p>Notwithstanding the submitted details, the following elements of the scheme shall not be installed, implemented or carried out unless in accordance with details which shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.</p><p>a.) Full details of repair and upgrading of timber sash windows&nbsp;</p><p>The works shall not be carried out unless in accordance with the details so approved.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</p>

<p>All new and replacement external rainwater and soil pipes shall be of traditional design, formed in cast iron/cast aluminium and painted black.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</p>

<p>No cleaning of masonry, other than low pressure (20-100 psi) surface cleaning using a nebulous water spray is authorised by this consent without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp; Before work begins, any other cleaning proposals must be approved in writing and carried out strictly in accordance with those details. At the commencement of the cleaning, a test panel shall be undertaken in an inconspicuous position and the method recorded to the approval of the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</p>

<p>All existing historic features including, but not limited to, chimney pieces, plasterwork, architraves, panelling, doors, staircase balustrading shall remain undisturbed in their existing position and shall be fully protected during the course of works on site, unless specifically authorised otherwise on the drawings hereby approved.&nbsp; The development and works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</p><div><div>REASON: In accordance with Section 17 (1) (b) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and to ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</div></div>

<p>Prior to the removal of any render full details of the extent of render proposed to be removed and specification, texture and colour, details shall be submitted and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The render shall be retained as such at all times.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</p>
